## AWSBuckets.bucketExists() method

Check if a bucket of a given name exists

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bucketExists(bucketName: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bucketName | string | Target bucket name |

<b>Returns:</b>
